benchmark_details.name: DischargeSim
benchmark_details.overview: DischargeSim is a novel benchmark that evaluates large language models (LLMs) on their ability to act as personalized discharge educators through simulated post-visit conversations.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate and improve the discharge education capabilities of large language models in post-visit clinical education.

data.annotation: Manual generation of multiple-choice questions by experts.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated include linguistic clarity, coherence, and factual accuracy based on human references.
methodology.interpretation: Scores indicate the effectiveness of the LLMs in facilitating patient education during discharge.
methodology.baseline_results: Various LLMs were benchmarked, revealing performance variation across different models.
methodology.validation: Evaluated by both LLMs and clinicians against established clinical benchmarks.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Evaluation includes patient profiles based on health literacy, education, and emotional states.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data derived from de-identified public datasets with no personal information.
